message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this incredible product. Knowing its value to someone like you, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire something truly special.
I'm interested in the product, but $1,500,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $800,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the product's true value is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This is my best offer and reflects the unique nature of what I'm offering.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1,300,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be at $950,000 to make this work. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be responsible with my finances.
